basics.name: Shane Trimbur
basics.label: Solutions Architect -- Client Solutions -- Cybersecurity Engineering
basics.summary: Veteran technology strategist with extensive DoD enterprise expertise spanning two decades. Proven ability to build and guide diverse teams while establishing forward-looking capabilities that exceed targets. Employs insider knowledge as a Marine technical leader versed in delivering innovative solutions that meet complex government needs. Leverages deep defense sector expertise to transform mission requirements into enterprise-ready architectures.

work.name: 3rd Marine Aircraft Wing
work.position: Data Systems Engineering Officer -- Information Systems Security Engineer
work.summary: Leading enterprise cloud adoption and data fusion initiatives for MARFORPAC and 3rd MAW.
highlights: Spearheaded enterprise cloud adoption initiative impacting MARFORPAC and 3rd MAW
Pioneered innovative Azure-based data fusion system
Established advanced JADC2 capabilities
responsibilities: Implementing experimental multi-cloud architecture through the Joint Warfighting Cloud Capability program
Integrating Naval Research Labs with partner agencies for real-time environmental intelligence sharing
achievements: Designed and coordinated authority to operate for hybrid cloud environmental intelligence integrations for enhanced battlefield visualization

work.name: Marine Wing Communications Squadron 38
work.position: Data Systems Engineering Officer -- Information Systems Security Engineer
work.summary: Led award-winning JADC2 transformation initiative and tactical infrastructure modernization.
highlights: Led systems engineering activities toward award-winning JADC2 transformation initiative
Modernized tactical infrastructure supporting 20,000+ joint force personnel
Supervised integration of advanced network systems during Project Convergence
responsibilities: Led systems engineering activities toward award-winning JADC2 transformation initiative that earned both the 2022 Shea Award and DON IT Excellence Award
Modernized tactical infrastructure supporting 20,000+ joint force personnel, implementing resilient architecture
Supervised integration of advanced network systems during Project Convergence, significantly reducing sensor-to-shooter timelines
achievements: Orchestrated integration of 300+ emerging technologies during Project Convergence 22, enhancing Joint/Multinational interoperability and JADC2 capabilities
Implemented advanced sensor-to-shooter architectures that significantly improved battlefield network integration and command and control capabilities
Contributed to successful demonstration of joint force capabilities across U.S., U.K., and Australian forces, supporting multi-domain operations

work.name: Marine Corps Communications-Electronics School
work.summary: Led IT portfolio management, IT personnel development, and educational technology transformation initiatives.
highlights: Managed $9M+ annual IT portfolio program, ensuring regulatory compliance and driving continuous modernization efforts.
Lead and mentored a diverse team of 10 Marines, 3 senior GS employees, and 3 contractors, fostering technical proficiency and professional development.
Transformed educational delivery through comprehensive redesign of campus wireless architecture and business strategy, significantly enhancing accessibility and connectivity.
Directed $27M in technology modernization initiatives over three years, expanding network infrastructure and increasing educational accessibility by 40% for over 30,000 students.
responsibilities: Oversee comprehensive IT portfolio and compliance programs, aligning technical initiatives with mission objectives.
Lead cross-functional teams of military, civilian, and contractor personnel, ensuring seamless collaboration and execution of strategic initiatives.
Implement large-scale infrastructure improvements to enhance cybersecurity, connectivity, and operational efficiency.
achievements: Achieved 100% NIST/CNSS compliance across all systems, strengthening cybersecurity and regulatory adherence.
Led and developed a high-performing team, fostering professional growth, securing performance-based incentives, and driving operational excellence.
Provided mentorship and strategic guidance that empowered new team members to take ownership of critical programs, improving compliance and earning organizational recognition.
Optimized $9M+ annual budget utilization, ensuring efficient allocation of resources and maximizing impact.

work.name: Special Purpose Marine Air Ground Task Force Crisis Response-Central Command
work.summary: Led multi-site cybersecurity operations in forward-deployed environments, collaborating with intelligence stakeholders to develop security policies and manage incident responses, ensuring the protection of Top Secret/Sensitive Compartmented Information (TS/SCI) and safeguarding mission-critical data and personnel.
highlights: Directed complex multi-site cybersecurity operations, maintaining zero security compromises in high-risk areas.
Developed and implemented comprehensive cybersecurity policies to enhance compliance and mitigate risks.
Engineered advanced threat detection systems and data loss prevention tools, ensuring real-time response to emerging threats.
Led incident response operations for security breaches and classified data spillages, preventing potential threats to mission success and personnel safety.
responsibilities: Manage cybersecurity operations across multiple forward operating bases, ensuring continuous protection of mission-critical assets.
Develop and enforce cybersecurity policies to maintain compliance and operational security standards.
Implement and maintain advanced security systems to detect, mitigate, and respond to cyber threats.
Lead incident response efforts for security breaches and classified data spillages, minimizing operational risks and ensuring rapid containment.
achievements: Maintained zero security compromises in high-threat environments through proactive security measures.
Safeguarded mission-critical data and communications by implementing robust security architectures.
Developed and enforced cybersecurity policies, enhancing compliance and reducing vulnerabilities.
Led rapid incident response for classified data spillages, preventing potential threats to mission success and personnel safety.

work.name: 1st Marine Logistics Group
work.summary: Led cybersecurity operations and network security initiatives in collaboration with key defense partners.
highlights: Coordinated joint cybersecurity operations with USN Cyber Protection Team, implementing Security Onion suite for enhanced network visibility

Evaluated and deployed cutting-edge security analytics solutions
achievements: Successfully implemented Security Onion enterprise monitoring suite

work.name: Marine Corps Communications-Electronics School
work.summary: Delivered over 1,200 hours of technical instruction to military personnel, honing expertise in public speaking and adapting complex concepts to diverse audiences.
highlights: Developed comprehensive DoD-aligned cybersecurity curriculum, incorporating emerging threats and defense strategies
Delivered advanced technical instruction to 200+ students in enterprise security tools, vulnerability management, and network defense
Established rigorous evaluation frameworks ensuring training materials maintain relevance against sophisticated cyber threats and align with DoD cybersecurity requirements

Provide technical instruction in enterprise security
Create and implement training evaluation frameworks
achievements: Led strategic learning analysis and high-level planning needed for evolving technologies and USMC integration with Joint partners in Cyberspace Operations. Efforts were leveraged toward the successful transition to the 1721 Cyberspace Warfare Operator Military Occupational Specialty (MOS).
Collaborated with intelligence stakeholders to develop and implement comprehensive cybersecurity training programs aligned with Department of Defense (DoD) standards.
Modernized training materials to address emerging threats, incorporating the latest cybersecurity strategies and technologies.

volunteer.summary: Participated in monthly reading programs to empower at-risk youth in Pasadena through literacy education.

Participated in monthly Saturday reading programs at Villa 500 community center
Helped develop students' literacy skills while fostering a love of reading

projects.name: TrimburTech Cybersecurity Platform
projects.description: Enterprise cybersecurity platform offering comprehensive security solutions including zero trust architecture, cloud security, network engineering, and security operations. Features advanced monitoring systems and AI-powered analytics for proactive threat detection.
highlights: Implemented Zero Trust security framework with strict identity verification
Developed cloud security architecture for AWS, Azure, and GCP
Built enterprise network design focusing on security and performance
Created 24/7 SOC monitoring and incident response system
Integrated compliance frameworks (HIPAA, PCI, SOC2, GDPR)
Deployed AI-powered security analytics for threat detection

projects.name: MongoFlow
projects.description: A production-ready CI/CD pipeline that integrates MongoDB Atlas with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and DevSecOps best practices. Enables secure, scalable cloud-native applications while minimizing operational overhead.
highlights: Automated MongoDB Atlas provisioning via Terraform
Implemented CI/CD using GitHub Actions
Integrated security scanning (Snyk, Checkov)
Built polyglot microservices architecture (Python, Go)
Deployed serverless infrastructure on AWS
Implemented Zero Trust security model

projects.name: Cisco Router Automation
projects.description: Ansible automation for configuring and hardening Cisco IR1835 Industrial Routers, designed for industrial and edge computing environments where reliability and security are critical.
highlights: Developed Ansible playbooks for automated router configuration
Implemented security hardening best practices
Created execution environment using Red Hat containers
Built comprehensive fact gathering and validation system
Integrated with enterprise monitoring tools

projects.name: Security Tools Collection
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of security-focused utilities and scripts designed to streamline and automate common security tasks and assessments.
highlights: Developed Nessus to POAM converter for compliance reporting
Automated vulnerability assessment workflows
Integrated with enterprise security tools
Built PowerShell modules for security automation
Implemented professional Excel report generation

projects.name: Weather Data Aggregator
projects.description: Full-stack application designed to scrape weather data (METAR reports), store it in Azure Blob Storage, and index it in Elasticsearch for analysis with Kibana.
highlights: Built Python scraper for weather data collection
Implemented Node.js backend API
Integrated Elasticsearch and Kibana for data analysis
Deployed on Azure cloud infrastructure
Created modular and extensible architecture

projects.name: ATC Monitoring Service
projects.description: Serverless AWS Lambda-based service for monitoring and processing air traffic control audio files, including fetching, transcribing, and analyzing audio communications.
highlights: Developed serverless architecture using AWS Lambda
Implemented audio processing pipeline
Created S3-based storage solution
Built SQS notification system
Integrated with AWS transcription services
